resources.string: ScanSearch is a non-profit App that aids cancer patients in finding clinical trials world-wide
With CanSearch, you can make a generic or specified search using key words such as disease subtype, gender, or your location
Because of the extensive list of clinical trials, CanSearch allows you to store those of interest to you to save you the hassle of finding them again
For clinical trials that provide contact information, you can easily Email or Phone the Director of Research for trials of interest
